00033 /********************* MM_typecode query fucntions ***************************/
00034 
00035 #define mm_is_matrix(typecode)  ((typecode)[0]=='M')
00036 
00037 #define mm_is_sparse(typecode)  ((typecode)[1]=='C')
00038 #define mm_is_coordinate(typecode)((typecode)[1]=='C')
00039 #define mm_is_dense(typecode) ((typecode)[1]=='A')
00040 #define mm_is_array(typecode) ((typecode)[1]=='A')
00041 
00042 #define mm_is_complex(typecode) ((typecode)[2]=='C')
00043 #define mm_is_real(typecode)    ((typecode)[2]=='R')
00044 #define mm_is_pattern(typecode) ((typecode)[2]=='P')
00045 #define mm_is_integer(typecode) ((typecode)[2]=='I')
00046 
00047 #define mm_is_symmetric(typecode)((typecode)[3]=='S')
00048 #define mm_is_general(typecode) ((typecode)[3]=='G')
00049 #define mm_is_skew(typecode)  ((typecode)[3]=='K')
00050 #define mm_is_hermitian(typecode)((typecode)[3]=='H')
00051 
00052 int mm_is_valid(char* matcode);   /* too complex for a macro */
00053 
00054 
00055 /********************* MM_typecode modify fucntions ***************************/
00056 
00057 #define mm_set_matrix(typecode) ((*typecode)[0]='M')
00058 #define mm_set_coordinate(typecode) ((*typecode)[1]='C')
00059 #define mm_set_array(typecode)  ((*typecode)[1]='A')
00060 #define mm_set_dense(typecode)  mm_set_array(typecode)
00061 #define mm_set_sparse(typecode) mm_set_coordinate(typecode)
00062 
00063 #define mm_set_complex(typecode)((*typecode)[2]='C')
00064 #define mm_set_real(typecode) ((*typecode)[2]='R')
00065 #define mm_set_pattern(typecode)((*typecode)[2]='P')
00066 #define mm_set_integer(typecode)((*typecode)[2]='I')
00067 
00068 
00069 #define mm_set_symmetric(typecode)((*typecode)[3]='S')
00070 #define mm_set_general(typecode)((*typecode)[3]='G')
00071 #define mm_set_skew(typecode) ((*typecode)[3]='K')
00072 #define mm_set_hermitian(typecode)((*typecode)[3]='H')
00073 
00074 #define mm_clear_typecode(typecode) ((*typecode)[0]=(*typecode)[1]= \
00075                   (*typecode)[2]=' ',(*typecode)[3]='G')
00076 
00077 #define mm_initialize_typecode(typecode) mm_clear_typecode(typecode)
00078

00080 /********************* Matrix Market error codes ***************************/
00081 
00082 
00083 #define MM_COULD_NOT_READ_FILE  11
00084 #define MM_PREMATURE_EOF    12
00085 #define MM_NOT_MTX        13
00086 #define MM_NO_HEADER      14
00087 #define MM_UNSUPPORTED_TYPE   15
00088 #define MM_LINE_TOO_LONG    16
00089 #define MM_COULD_NOT_WRITE_FILE 17
00090 
00091 
00092 /******************** Matrix Market internal definitions ********************
00093 
00094    MM_matrix_typecode: 4-character sequence
00095 
00096             ojbect    sparse/     data        storage 
00097                   dense       type        scheme
00098 
00099    string position:  [0]        [1]     [2]         [3]
00100 
00101    Matrix typecode:  M(atrix)  C(oord)    R(eal)    G(eneral)
00102                     A(array)  C(omplex)   H(ermitian)
00103                       P(attern)   S(ymmetric)
00104                         I(nteger) K(kew)
00105 
00106  ***********************************************************************/
00107

00112 #define MM_SPARSE_STR "coordinate"
00113 #define MM_COMPLEX_STR  "complex"
00114 #define MM_REAL_STR   "real"
00115 #define MM_INT_STR    "integer"
00116 #define MM_GENERAL_STR  "general"
00117 #define MM_SYMM_STR   "symmetric"
00118 #define MM_HERM_STR   "hermitian"
00119 #define MM_SKEW_STR   "skew-symmetric"
00120 #define MM_PATTERN_STR  "pattern"
